EmailTemplate.name: SSO Approval Email Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Request for Sold Sign Off submitted for Approval - {!Sold_Sign_Off__c.Account__c}/DBA: {!Sold_Sign_Off__c.DBA__c} {!Sold_Sign_Off__c.Email_employer_Type__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi,
The Sold Sign Off : {!Sold_Sign_Off__c.Name} for {!Sold_Sign_Off__c.Account__c}/DBA: {!Sold_Sign_Off__c.DBA__c}, {!Sold_Sign_Off__c.Email_employer_Type__c} has been submitted for Approval. Please Review.
Thank you.
